dialogues.text: Structure detected: Floor appears brittle but intact. Breaking it is currently beyond your capabilities.
I noticed. Mark it. We’ll come back later.
Acknowledged. Nearby anomaly detected: A portal-like phenomenom with unknown functionality.
It’s a portal. Step in, come out somewhere else. Basic enough.
Clarification: Are you certain this will not result in catastrophic disintegration?
Pretty sure. Used these before. Still here, aren’t I? It's just a matter of pressing the J key at the right time.
Logical. Proceeding to update records: Portal confirmed as functional and... survivable.
